00009 #include "osm-parse.h"

00011 #include <QString>
00012 #include <QFile>
00013 #include <QDebug>
00014 
00019 void OsmData::parse(QString filename)
00020 {
00021     QFile f(filename);
00022     f.open(QIODevice::ReadOnly);
00023     parse(&f);
00024     f.close();
00025 }
00026 
00028 static inline bool isDelim(char c)
00029 {
00030     return (c == ' ') || (c == '<') || (c == '\t') || (c == '>') || (c == '/');
00031 }
00032 
00033 // NOTE: These defines are for debugging only.
00034 // #define NO_NODES
00035 // #define NO_WAYS
00036 // #define STOP_AT_FIRST_WAY
00037 
00038 
00039 void OsmData::processTag(char *tag)
00040 {
00041     #ifndef NO_NODES
00042     if (!strncmp(tag, "node", 5)) {
00043         (*nodes)[nodeid] = OsmNode(lat, lon);
00044         nodes_total++;
00045         if (!(nodes_total & 0x3ffff)) qDebug() << "Nodes:" << nodes_total;
00046     }
00047     #else
00048     #warning Parsing of nodes is disabled.
00049     #endif
00050     
00051     #ifndef NO_WAYS
00052 //     else
00053     if (!strncmp(tag, "way", 4)) {
00054         keep = false;
00055         currentWay.clear();
00056         currentWay.setId(wayid);
00057     } else if (!strncmp(tag, "nd", 3)) {
00058         currentWay.addNode(noderef);
00059     } else if (!strncmp(tag, "/way", 5)) {
00060         if (keep) {
00061             ways->append(currentWay);
00062             foreach(OsmNodeId nodeid, currentWay.nodes) {
00063                 (*nodes)[nodeid].incOrder();
00064             }
00065             nodes_referenced += currentWay.nodes.count();
00066             kept++;
00067         } else {
00068             //The way object will be reused
00069             discarded++;
00070         }
00071     }
00072     #else
00073     #warning Parsing of ways is disabled.
00074     #ifdef STOP_AT_FIRST_WAY
00075         if (!strncmp(tag, "way", 4)) {
00076             exit(0);
00077         }
00078     #endif
00079     #endif
00080 }
00081 
00082 void OsmData::processParam(char *tag, char *name, char *value)
00083 {
00084     if (!strcmp("lat", name)) {
00085         lat = atof(value);
00086     } else if (!strcmp("lon", name)) {
00087         lon = atof(value);
00088     } else if (!strcmp("ref", name)) {
00089         noderef = atoi(value);
00090     } else if (!strcmp("id", name)) {
00091         if (!strcmp("node", tag)) {
00092             nodeid = atoi(value);
00093         } else {
00094             wayid = atoi(value);
00095         }
00096     } else if (!strcmp("k", name) && !strcmp("highway", value)) {
00097         keep = true;
00098     }
00099 }
00100 
00102 #define BUFFER_LEN 1024
00103 
00104 #define TAG_LEN 16
00105 
00106 #define PARAM_NAME_LEN 16
00107 
00108 #define PARAM_VALUE_LEN 16
00109 
00116 void OsmData::parse(QFile *file)
00117 {
00118     kept = discarded = nodes_referenced = nodes_total = 0;
00119     QDataStream stream(file);
00120     char buffer[BUFFER_LEN];
00121     char tag[TAG_LEN];
00122     char param_name[PARAM_NAME_LEN];
00123     char param_value[PARAM_VALUE_LEN];
00124     int tag_pos, name_pos, value_pos;
00125     int count;
00126     bool inside_quotes;
00127     enum {
00128         state_waiting_for_tag_start,
00129         state_waiting_for_tag_end,
00130         state_waiting_for_param_end,
00131         state_tag,
00132         state_param_name,
00133         state_param_value,
00134     } state;
00135 
00136     do {
00137         count = stream.readRawData(buffer, BUFFER_LEN);
00138         int i;
00139         for (i = 0; i < count; i++) {
00140             char c = buffer[i];
00141             //Shortcuts to keep processing time low
00142             if ((state == state_waiting_for_tag_start) && (c != '<')) continue;
00143             if ((state == state_waiting_for_tag_end) && (c != '>')) continue;
00144             if (c == '<') {
00145                 //A < always starts a new tag (except in CDATA areas which we don't have in OSM data)
00146                 state = state_tag;
00147                 tag_pos = 0;
00148                 continue;
00149             }
00150             if (c == '>') {
00151                 if (tag_pos) {
00152                     tag[tag_pos] = 0;
00153                 }
00154                 if (value_pos) { //Value is terminated by this end-of-tag-char
00155                     param_value[value_pos] = 0;
00156                     //qDebug() << "\tValue1:" << param_value;
00157                     processParam(tag, param_name, param_value);
00158                 }
00159                 processTag(tag);
00160                 state = state_waiting_for_tag_start;
00161             }
00162             /******************************************************************/
00163             if (state == state_tag) {
00164                 if (isblank(c)) {
00165                     if (!tag_pos) continue; //Tag text has not started yes
00166                     else {
00167                         state = state_param_name;
00168                         name_pos = 0;
00169                         tag[tag_pos] = 0;
00170                         tag_pos = 0;
00171                         //qDebug() << "Tag:" << tag;
00172                     }
00173                 } else if (tag_pos < TAG_LEN-1) {
00174                     tag[tag_pos++] = c;
00175                 }
00176             }
00177             /******************************************************************/
00178             if (state == state_param_name) {
00179                 if ((c == '"') || (c == '\'') || isblank(c)) continue; //Ignore some chars
00180                 if (c == '=') {
00181                     //Name ended
00182                     state = state_param_value;
00183                     value_pos = 0;
00184                     inside_quotes = false;
00185                     param_name[name_pos] = 0;
00186                     //qDebug() << "\tParam:" << param_name;
00187                 } else if (name_pos < PARAM_NAME_LEN-1) {
00188                     param_name[name_pos++] = c;
00189                 }
00190             }
00191             /******************************************************************/
00192             if (state == state_param_value) {
00193                 if (c == '"' || c == '\'') {
00194                     inside_quotes = !inside_quotes;
00195                     continue;
00196                 }
00197                 if (!inside_quotes && isDelim(c)) {
00198                     param_value[value_pos] = 0;
00199                     state = state_param_name;
00200                     name_pos = 0;
00201                     processParam(tag, param_name, param_value);
00202                     value_pos = 0;
00203                     continue;
00204                 }
00205                 if ((c == '=' || isblank(c))) continue;
00206                 if (value_pos < PARAM_VALUE_LEN-1) {
00207                     param_value[value_pos++] = c;
00208                 }
00209             }
00210         }
00211     }
00212     while (count > 0);
00213     qDebug() << "Kept:" << kept << "Discarded:" << discarded <<  "Noderefs:" << nodes_referenced << "Nodes:" << nodes_total;
00214 }
Generated on Tue Aug 27 2013 18:39:11 for SRTM2Wayinfo by  1.7.4
